alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 1:41AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN NORTHAMPTON...GREENSVILLE... CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON...SOUTHERN SUSSEX AND SOUTHEASTERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF EMPORIA THROUGH 230 AM EST... At 141 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Barley, or 8 miles southwest of Emporia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Emporia around 145 AM EST. Green Plain around 155 AM EST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Adams Grove, Grizzard, Bufford Crossroads, Lanes Corner, Yale, Pleasant Shade, Lumberton, Slates Corner, Emporia Reservoir, and Worrell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
